Package nl.b3p.brmo.util.http

Interface HttpClientWrapper<REQUEST,RESPONSE>

Type Parameters:
REQUEST - An implementation defined HTTP request type.
RESPONSE - An implementation defined HTTP response type.
All Known Implementing Classes:
Java11HttpClientWrapper, URLConnectionHttpClientWrapper
public interface HttpClientWrapper<REQUEST,RESPONSE>
A wrapper around a HTTP client with only the functionality needed by this package.
Author:
Matthijs Laan

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    beforeRequest(REQUEST request)
    Override to modify the request before it is sent, such as adding a User-Agent header.
    HttpResponseWrapper
    request(URI uri, String... requestHeaders)
    Perform a synchronous HTTP GET request.
    HttpResponseWrapper
    wrapResponse(RESPONSE response)
    Wrap the HTTP response so the status code, response headers en the response body can be read.

  • Method Details

    • request

      HttpResponseWrapper request(URI uri, String... requestHeaders) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Perform a synchronous HTTP GET request.
      Parameters:
      uri - The URI.
      requestHeaders - The request headers to send. The supplied String instances must alternate as header names and header values. Only single request header values are expected.
      Returns:
      A wrapper with the response.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
      InterruptedException - if any

    • beforeRequest

      default void beforeRequest(REQUEST request)
      Override to modify the request before it is sent, such as adding a User-Agent header.
      Parameters:
      request - The implementation defined HTTP request type.

    • wrapResponse

      HttpResponseWrapper wrapResponse(RESPONSE response)
      Wrap the HTTP response so the status code, response headers en the response body can be read.
      Parameters:
      response - The implementation defined HTTP response type.
      Returns:
      wrapped response
